name: Oliver Canon
description:
I’m a free spirited person, respectable and i love to have fun and exploring new things. One thing i can never stray from is God and my music ( Singing) and that’s my roots! I’m a God fearing person, I Put god first in whatever i do and would love someone that has the same mindset as me. I believe in true love and i’m a very loyal and honest person, never been married and hoped to be in the future. I treat others with respect and i’m not quick to judge people i firstly listen to their story… I love making others happy and i hope i do find that special one to make me happy and though i plan to make him and only him. I’m very talented,jovial and down to earth and whatever i set my mind to i go after it . Life is short and i plan to make the best of it.
I’m looking for a God fearing woman and person that is fun , jovial and loves music too. One that i am spiritually compatible with and believes in true love. A woman that is committed and serious for a long-term relationship and no flings. knows when to take a adventure and very goal orientated. I am looking for that great woman who is not afraid to show his heart or willing to have his heart fixed if it was broken.Looking for a trustworthy, dependable woman who has a good sense of humor and is spontaneous. Would love to find someone who shares the same interest.
